tachyon.worker.block.meta

Class BlockMetaBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.meta.BlockMetaBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockMeta, TempBlockMeta

    public abstract class BlockMetaBase
extends Object
    A base class of the metadata of blocks in Tachyon managed storage.

    • Method Detail

      • tempPath

        public static String tempPath(StorageDir dir,
              long sessionId,
              long blockId)
        All blocks are created as temp blocks before committed. They are stored in BlockStore under a subdir of its StorageDir, the subdir is the same as the creator's sessionId, and the block file is the same as its blockId. e.g. sessionId 2 creates a temp Block 100 in StorageDir "/mnt/mem/0", this temp block has path:

        /mnt/mem/0/2/100

        Parameters:
        blockId - the block id
        userId - the user id
        dir - the parent directory
        Returns:
        temp file path

      • commitPath

        public static String commitPath(StorageDir dir,
                long blockId)
        Committed block is stored in BlockStore under its StorageDir as a block file named after its blockId. e.g. Block 100 of StorageDir "/mnt/mem/0" has path:

        /mnt/mem/0/100

        Parameters:
        blockId - the block id
        dir - the parent directory
        Returns:
        committed file path
